meanings.sent1: The cloddiest rock in the field was too heavy to lift.
meanings.sent2: The soil in the garden felt cloddiest after the rain.
meanings.sent3: The cloddiest potato in the bag made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her cloddiest thoughts weighed heavily on her mind.
meanings.sent5: The cloddiest mud stuck to his boots as he walked.

meanings.definition: Cloddiest: resembling or characteristic of a clod
meanings.sent1: His cloddiest behavior at the party embarrassed his friends.
meanings.sent2: The cloddiest manure smelled earthy and rich.
meanings.sent3: The cloddiest dance moves at the wedding made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her cloddiest jokes fell flat with the audience.
meanings.sent5: The cloddiest path through the field was well-worn by the cows.
